pricing_description: We believe AI assistance should be accessible to all. That's why our app is completely free to use, with all features included.
pricing_personal_use_description: Perfect for individual users and daily tasks
download_app_description: Get the full experience on your mobile device. Download our app now!
features_description: Your ultimate AI-powered assistant for smarter conversations, personalized support, and instant answers – right at your fingertips!
features_247_availability_description: Our chatbot never sleeps! Get assistance anytime, even at 3 AM.
features_voice_text_support_description: Interact via text or voice commands for a hands-free experience.
features_customizable_ai_description: Choose how your AI responds – professional, friendly, or casual.
company_description: We are redefining the interaction between humans and technology. Our journey began with a simple question:
company_question: What if everyone could have a personal assistant, always available, that learns and evolves?
mission_description: To create a natural and intelligent communication experience, accessible to everyone, everywhere. Our commitment is to make technology more human and intuitive.
vision_description: We envision a world where every interaction with technology is enriching and personalized. Our vision is to transform daily tasks into seamless and enjoyable experiences.
innovation_description: Innovation is at the core of our DNA. We constantly push the boundaries of AI to create more intuitive and personalized experiences.
advanced_ai_description: Our cutting-edge AI models provide accurate and intuitive responses, tailored to each user.
newsletter_description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates on new features, product launches, and more.
get_connected: Restez connecté avec nous sur les réseaux sociaux :
ai_assistant: AI assistant as your web and mobile app
ai_assistant_description: An AI assistant for web and mobile that streamlines tasks, answers queries, and enhances productivity with real-time, personalized support.
